programme.desc: Roz, Datin Seri dan Ejen Mah telah mengesan lokasi sebenar Rin. Dapatkan mereka menyelamatkan Rin dan mengelak dari identiti Roz terbongkar kepada pihak polis dan keluarganya?

programme.title: Kampung Boy S2 Ep06
programme.desc: Nikmati animasi terbaik hasil nukilan Dato' Lat yang penuh kreatif lagi menghiburkan ini istimewa untuk tontonan anda sekeluarga!

programme.title: Rimau Bangku Ep03
programme.desc: Azman ingin menjadi pemain bola sepak negara namun sering kali usahanya itu diperlekehkan oleh rakan-rakannya.

programme.title: Ultraman Z Ep05
programme.desc: Haruki Natsukawan ialah seorang juruterbang di unit robot Global Allied Forces Japan 'STORAGE'. Semasa Haruki bekerja untuk menjaga keamanan di Bumi, seorang Ultra Hero muncul iaitu Ultraman Z. Z

programme.title: Beyblade Metal Fusion Ep15
programme.desc: Rakan-rakan Gingka pergi ke kampung Gingka untuk mencarinya tetapi berhadapan dengan cabaran semasa perjalanan termasuklah seorang pengembara misteri Hyoma

programme.title: Citra Exclusive : Hantu Ustazah Supiah
programme.desc: Ustazah Supiah sering dibuli oleh anak muridnya sehingga satu hari, dia hilang sabar dan menghilangkan diri. Suatu hari Ustazah Supiah kembali sebagai hantu dan mengganggu mereka semua.

programme.title: Kafir
programme.desc: Separuh jiwa Sri tersimpan pada suaminya. Namun, setelah suaminya meninggal, Sri diganggu oleh pelbagai misteri yang membuatkan hidupnya porak-peranda.

programme.title: Setinggan
programme.desc: Penduduk kawasan setinggan menjadi mangsa gangguan hantu dari sebuah kubur tentera jepun. Antara yang menjadi mangsa gangguan ialah keluarga Pak Sudin. Burn dan 3 orang anak gadis.

programme.title: Kalbu Pun Berzikir
programme.desc: Kisah kasih sayang seorang ibu tunggal yang sanggup bekorban dan bekerja keras untuk membesarkan anak-anaknya. Kesempitan hidup mereka diduga apabila anak perempuannya disahkan mengidap barah.

programme.title: Karya 12-Pangkalan Batu 6
programme.desc: Kisah cinta singkat antara Mimi dan Li Sepila yang bertemu di sebuah pangkalan bertukar menjadi tragedi apabila identiti sebenar mereka mula terbongkar...

programme.title: Citra Exclusive: Anak Kerak
programme.desc: Husin telah menggunakan ilmu hitam iaitu dengan memuja 'Anak Kerak' demi untuk mendapatkan kekebalan, kesenangan dan kemewahan hidup di dunia

programme.title: Sepenggal Puisi Ep03
programme.desc: Rahsia yang di simpan selama 30 tahun akhirnya terbongkar dan menimbulkan konflik dalam 2 buah keluarga yang berada di Kuala Lumpur dan juga Yogyakarta.

programme.title: Bikers Kental
programme.desc: Kisah Bidin Al Zaifa dan abang sepupunya Aidil Al Zaifa yang berkonvoi bersama geng motosikal Eddie Cuardo ke Thailand yang penuh dengan pelbagai kisah, tragedi dan konflik di antara Bidin dan Eddie.

programme.title: Dilan 1990
programme.desc: Perkenalan luar biasa Milea dan Dilan akhirnya bertukar menjadi perasaan cinta. Mampukah mereka mengharungi dugaan untuk terus kekal bersama.

programme.title: Rabun
programme.desc: Sepasang suami isteri telah berpindah dari bandar ke kawasan luar bandar kerana rimas dengan kesibukkan hidup di sana. Namun, ketenangan hidup di luar bandar tidaklah seindah yang disangka.

programme.title: Episodic Trailer i-Tanggang Ep07
programme.desc: Saksikan drama bersiri 'i-Tanggang' setiap Isnin, 9 malam di saluran Astro Citra.

programme.title: Kami Histeria
programme.desc: Kisah komedi seram mengenai sekumpulan pemuzik indie wanita yang menggunakan 'khidmat' langsuir sebagai suara latar untuk lagu-lagu mereka. Lakonan Diana Danielle, Nad Zainal, Mila Jirin, Nur Fazura dan Af

programme.title: 3 A.M. Bangkok Ghost Stories Ep10
programme.desc: Dua orang vlogger tidak dapat melarikan diri dan harus membayar balik ke atas jenayah yang mereka lakukan.

programme.title: 3 A.M. Bangkok Ghost Stories (Series) Ep11
programme.desc: Bangkok Ghost Stories meneruskan perjalanan ke waktu paling gelap dan menakutkan pada malam itu. Apabila manusia dan roh, yang hidup dan yang mati, saling mencari.

programme.title: Cult of Chucky
programme.desc: Chucky kembali menghantui hidup mangsanya bernama Nica. Boneka pembunuh itu juga mempunyai urusan yang belum selesai dengan musuh lamanya dan merancang untuk menghapuskannya.

programme.title: Pelepas Saka
programme.desc: Asiah telah melepaskan sakanya kepada Haider tanpa disedari oleh Haider dan dia mula berubah sikap menjadi panas baran dan mengesyaki isterinya menjalinkan hubungan sulit dengan kembarnya.

programme.title: Senario Asam Garam
programme.desc: Kisah Asam dan Garam yang cuba mensabotaj warung Cik Hawa dan pejabat Pak Adam tetapi usaha mereka gagal kerana kebodohan mereka sendiri. Lakonan Mazlan Pet-Pet dan Zaibo.

programme.title: Che Pa
programme.desc: Che Pa merupakan seorang penari Hadrah yang terkenal pada suatu ketika dahulu dan masih menyimpan minat. Namun dia dipaksa oleh anak perempuannya untuk melupakan Hadrah kerana malu.

programme.title: Citra Exclusive: Kitab Sijjin
programme.desc: Adi merupakan seorang anak yang taat dan soleh, namun segala-galanya berubah selepas orang tuanya meninggal dunia dan dia mula menyalahkan takdir dan menjadi samseng.

programme.title: Ribbit
programme.desc: Seekor katak yang mengalami krisis identiti sedang mencari siapa dirinya yang sebenar dan dia percaya dirinya telah disumpah oleh satu kuasa jahat. Adakah dia akan menerima siapa dirinya yang sebenar?

programme.title: Adnan Sempit

programme.desc: Saksikan drama bersiri 'i-Tanggang' setiap Isnin, 9 malam di saluran Astro Citra.

programme.title: Dark Crimes
programme.desc: Penyiasatan dalam kes pembunuhan seorang usahawan bertukar menjadi petunjuk yang terdapat dalam buku seorang penulis mengenai jenayah yang serupa.

programme.title: MegaDrama: The Hotel Ep24

programme.title: MegaDrama: Jiwa Yang Kau Puja Ep01

programme.title: MegaDrama: Jiwa Yang Kau Puja Ep02
programme.desc: Umar terkejut bila mendapat berita yang Akash meninggal dunia. Umar panik bila dia disoal siasat. Umaira nasihatkan Umar supaya ceritakan apa yang terjadi supaya kes tidak menjadi lagi teruk.

programme.desc: Berkisarkan sebuah pasukan bola sepak kanak-kanak iaitu Kickers di sekolah rendah Kitahara memaparkan perjuangan pasukan tersebut untuk meraih kemenangan dalam setiap perlawanan.

programme.title: Masaklah Kaw!!! Ep07
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan masakan berbentuk 'game show' yg menyaksikan selebriti dan artis terkenal malaysia menunjukkan kehebatan masing2 dlm memasak.

programme.title: Jaman Tori Ep10
programme.desc: Badang terlalu sibuk membantu orang kampung sehingga masanya dengan anak dan isteri sering diganggu. Konflik bermula setelah isteri Badang mula menghiraukan Badang. Badang meminta bantuan Sang Kelambai

programme.title: Konfiden Ke Kenal? Ep06
programme.desc: Program yang akan menampilkan pasangan suami isteri yang akan diuji keserasian mereka dengan soalan-soalan berkaitan pasangan mereka.

programme.title: Layan Lockdown Ep04
programme.desc: Pelbagai gelagat dan keletah Ijat, Ryan and Amy menjalani kehidupan norma baharu serta perlu menghadapi cabaran demi kelangsungan hidup yang terjejas semasa pandemik.

programme.title: Jawapan Panas Ep12
programme.desc: Program 30 minit Jawapan Panas bersama dengan ustaz PU Azman menjawab soalan-soalan dari netizen minggu ini dari episod 11-15 membincangkan tema Huraian Hadis

programme.title: Ihsan Kita Ep03
programme.desc: Pengorbanan seorang ayah tak akan pernah habis. Namun, mengapa masih ada seorang anak yang tidak dapat membalas pengorbanan tersebut?

programme.title: Ayah Untuk Disewa
programme.desc: Tuan Borhan belum pernah dapat merasa bagaimana rasanya menjadi seorang ayah tiba-tiba terfikir untuk melakukan sesuatu yang 'gila'.

programme.title: Warung Wak 2 Ep02
programme.desc: Saksikan Wak Ropie dalam melayani pelanggan dengan pelbagai topik yang menarik.

programme.title: Roller Kata Ep05
programme.desc: Program yang menguji kemahiran meneka para peserta yang terdiri dari orang awam. Setiap peserta akan dibantu oleh selebriti tetap yang akan menjawab soalan umum sahaja.

programme.title: Oggy & the Cockroaches Ep37
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seekor kucing pemalas yang bernama Oggy. Dia suka menghabiskan hari-harinya dengan menonton televisyen dan makan. Tiga ekor lipas kecil, Joey, Marky dan Dee Dee suka menyerang peti sejuk Oggy

programme.title: Putri Untuk Pangeran Ep83
programme.desc: Putri dihalang untuk memasuki restoran untuk makan bersama ibunya. Pengurus restoran mendapat arahan dari Raymond untuk tidak membenarkan Putri memasuki tempat itu.

programme.title: Oh My Venus Ep10
programme.desc: Young Ho kecewa kerana terpaksa memisahkan antara kerjaya dan kehidupan peribadinya. Woo Shik dan Encik Ko tahu tentang identiti sebenar Young Ho dan menunggu masa untuk mendedahkannya.

programme.title: Awesome Minggu Ini Ep08
programme.desc: Awesome Minggu ini sebuah program yang membawa 7 kisah pendek setiap minggu dan menampilkan seorang artis jemputan wanita yang berlainan setiap minggu.

programme.title: Mr London Ms Langkawi Ep04
programme.desc: Liyana membawa Aidid berjalan-jalan di sekitar Pulau Langkawi.

programme.title: Pagar Pagar Cinta
programme.desc: Bidin, anak orang kaya telah jatuh hati kepada Rosnah, adik Mamat. Tetapi ibunya melarang kerana mahu menjodohkan Bidin dengan Rita yang sama taraf.

programme.title: Alamak Ep01
programme.desc: Sebuah program yang mempunyai sketsa komedi spontan, nyanyian dan wayang kulit. Hos daripada Tok Dalang wayang kulit di belakang layar. Pemain harus berinteraksi dengan patung wayang kulit.

programme.title: The Blacklist S9 Ep02

programme.desc: Through rich encounters, witness the captivating bond between the people of China and the world outside. Celebrating diversity, the program also introduces China and its spirit to the world.

programme.title: Network News
programme.desc: Network News is a 30-minute news program which features news on China and the world.

programme.title: Wu Ming Wei Shi Ep16
programme.desc: This broad selection of drama series genres includes romance, military and family connections, captured in China's great classics.

programme.title: Wu Ming Wei Shi Ep17
programme.desc: This broad selection of drama series genres includes romance, military and family connections, captured in China's great classics.

programme.title: Heroes Two
programme.desc: Shaolin loyalists (led by Alexander Fu Sheng and Chen Kuan Tai) go up against a formidable Manchu general and his Tibetan allies.

programme.title: Tiger Killer
programme.desc: Adapted from the novel Water Margin and starring Ti Lung, this award-winning drama depicts how the courageous Wu Song defeats a tiger, and his bond with Wu Da Lang.

programme.title: Magnificent Wanderers
programme.desc: Share the adventures of patriot Chu Tieh-hsieh and his three comrades, who head out with the aim of 'relieving' Mongolian invaders of their ill-gotten gains.

programme.title: Invincible Enforcer
programme.desc: This hard-hitting drama is based on a real-life investigation on the involvement of both cops as well as crooks in second offences.

programme.title: That Fiery Girl
programme.desc: Death and destruction are the order of the day after a bandit's daughter learns some painful truths about her past.

programme.title: Village of Tigers
programme.desc: Shu Pei-pei shines in this production alongside hero Yueh Hua, her stalwart companion, in a battle to rid their town of killers and thieves.

programme.title: Rolls, Rolls, I Love You
programme.desc: When an argument gets out of hand between a regular Joe and a wealthy businessman, regular Joe finds himself thrust into the middle of a high stakes wager!

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu Lan
programme.desc: A young woman joins the army in place of her old, ailing father and only when she returns home is the truth revealed.

programme.title: The Lady Professional
programme.desc: Lily Ho stars in this movie as a revenge seeking gun-for-hire who always gets her man in more ways than one!

programme.title: The Brave Archer 2
programme.desc: In this 'Brave Archer' sequel, Kuo Tsing's (Alexander Fu Sheng) love for Huang Yung (Niu Niu) is challenged by Ouyang Fung.

programme.title: Brotherhood
programme.desc: Liu, who is trying to shed his criminal side, instead finds himself caught up in an all-out gang war that comes to a startling conclusion.

programme.title: Rape of the Sword
programme.desc: When a swordswoman falters in her attempt to reclaim her murdered husband's 'Green Sword,' the world's sharpest blade, her protg continues her quest.

programme.title: The Deadly Knives
programme.desc: Two lovers who return to announce their marriage plans discover that their families are in conflict over land. Can they mend this broken bond?

programme.title: Killers on Wheels
programme.desc: While taking a ferry on the way to a vacation, Kwok and his family meet a road thug who puts an ugly spin on their holiday plans.

programme.title: Woman of the Night
programme.desc: This three-film anthology collectively offers up a captivating examination of human obsession and love.

programme.title: A Taste of Cold Steel
programme.desc: It's a no-holds-barred battle to the death for possession of the invaluable Purple Sword, as the Five Tigers take this adventure to the outer limits.

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: Three sisters (the quietest and most filial of whom is played by Cheng Pei Pei) attempt to sing and dance their way to happiness.

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: A righteous man who can't fight and an unjustly wronged swordsman team up to battle against evil.

programme.title: The Invincible Fist
programme.desc: A village's dedicated chief constable falls in love with the blind daughter of a havoc-wreaking bandit.

programme.title: Five Tough Guys
programme.desc: Guaranteed to sweep the audience off their feet, this battle between a usurper of the throne and patriots led by Wu Wen-yuan climaxes in an eventful ending!

programme.title: The New One-Armed Swordsman
programme.desc: A swordsman (David Chiang) is moved to fight back after the love of his life is kidnapped and his best friend murdered by a gang.

programme.title: The Singing Killer
programme.desc: A singer is blackmailed into committing a heist but when he finds his first love working in the store which he's supposed to rob.

programme.title: Brave Archer and His Mate
programme.desc: Fourth in the hugely popular series, the leader of 'Venom', supported by his fellow members and Brave Archer associates, sets out to defeat a mass murderer.

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Ding, a con woman swindles a diamond ring off a rich man, but when it ends up in another man's hands, she now has to get it back.

programme.title: Clan of Amazons
programme.desc: This action-packed adventure centres on a mysterious masked highwayman who not only steals from the rich but also blinds them!

programme.title: The Villains
programme.desc: When the younger of two brothers becomes a villain, tragedy lurks when his elder brother makes it his mission to take him down.

programme.title: The Long Chase
programme.desc: The chase may be long, but the action is fast and furious, in this tale of a dart master-for-hire and the innkeeper's daughter who loves him.

programme.title: Hex Vs Witchcraft
programme.desc: After a compulsive gambler's wife leaves him, he gets offered a beautiful ghost as his new wife.

programme.title: Pursuit
programme.desc: Written and directed by Cheng Kang, this classic film starring Yueh Wah depicts how the Sung Dynasty army's chief instructor is framed by a corrupt minister.

programme.title: House of Flying Daggers
programme.desc: As the Tang Dynasty declines, several rebel groups are established, with the largest being the House of Flying Daggers. Two officers are ordered to kill the elusive leader of the group.

programme.title: To Love or Not to Love
programme.desc: Casey had her heart broken by her high school boyfriend, Elton. Three years later, Casey now much choose between the perfect guy, Adam and Elton as the truth behind Elton's betrayal is revealed.

programme.title: Shoplifters
programme.desc: Winner of the Palme d'Or at the Cannes Film Festival. A shoplifter comes across a little girl in the freezing cold, whom his wife agrees to take in. But what secrets is the girl hiding?

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: When an extreme sports enthusiast is mistaken as a triad member, he soon finds himself in Budapest alongside an agent & three other individual in a war against terrorism.

programme.title: Who Killed Cock Robin
programme.desc: A Taiwanese crime masterpiece not to be missed! An investigation into a long-forgotten accident reveals an unimaginable dark truth.

programme.title: As the Light Goes Out
programme.desc: When a liquor warehouse fire threatens to plunge the whole of Hong Kong into darkness upon reaching a nearby power plant, can firefighters avert this disaster?

programme.title: I Love Hong Kong 2012
programme.desc: Featuring an all HK-star cast, this movie depicts how a weatherman is faced with the biggest challenge of his life when he receives a shocking forecast.

programme.title: Love Revolution
programme.desc: Shortlisted at the 9th Okinawa International Movie Festival, Sam Lee's action romance depicts a spirited woman who sets out to rescue her dope-running boyfriend, when he is kidnapped in Thailand.

programme.title: Zombiology: Enjoy Yourself Tonight
programme.desc: Two eccentric young men lead a reckless life - but when people start turning into zombies across the city, they take on the responsibility of braving the infected district to save others.

programme.title: Chinese Odyssey 2002
programme.desc: A young emperor & his cross-dressing sister, and a restaurant-owning wanderer & his sibling descends into a swirl of gender confusion, slapstick antics & romance.

programme.title: Nezha
programme.desc: Produced by megastar Jay Chou, this drama starring Will Liu & Wang Jun Kai depicts how a former top team racing driver's focus on proving himself leads to his team's downfall.

programme.title: The Grand Grandmaster
programme.desc: Disgraced by a lady fighter named Chun, the Grandmaster Fei Lung's unexpected romantic feelings towards her threatens to derail his win in the final fight he has challenged her to.

programme.title: Fearless
programme.desc: This incredible true story of real-life hero, Huo Yuan Jia, depicts how one man fights to balance the scales by taking on a list of ferocious opponents.

programme.title: When Sun Meet Moon
programme.desc: Shortlisted at the 8th Beijing International Film Festival, starring Kathy Yuen & Daichi Harashima. Two young astrology enthusiasts meet under the starry night during a massive power outage in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Funny Soccer
programme.desc: Lam Chi Chung from Shaolin Soccer delivers another wildly nonsensical Hong Kong comedy with rock singer Shin as a crazy soccer team captain who pushes his team to victory!

programme.title: Love off the Cuff
programme.desc: In this third instalment, can Cherie and Jimmy overcome their seven-year itch? The path to finding the answer is filled with laughter and tears.

programme.title: The Sleep Curse
programme.desc: After two cult classic films from the 90s - director Herman Yau & Anthony Wong reunite, and together with Gordon Lam, Michelle Wai & Jojo Goh, challenge your limit in this paranormal thriller.

programme.title: The Golden Job
programme.desc: Former mercenaries reunite for a noble heist only to realize that one of them is double-crossing them. Filmed across Europe & Asia and stars Ekin Cheng, Jordan Chan, Michael Tse, Jerry Lamb & Chin Ka Lok.

programme.title: Hotel Deluxe
programme.desc: When service at the 5-star Bai Xing Hotel is not living up to its billing, tough executive Cruella Koo is sent to whip the employees into shape and inject a little glamour into the hotel.

programme.title: Legend of Mysterious Agent
programme.desc: Female students in Baicheng are missing and killed by vampires. Exorcism trio tries to hunt them down. A Millennium vampire disguises as the warlord, only to collect the blood of missing girls.

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A remake from the Japanese movie Key of Life, Andy Lau, Xiao Yang and Wan Qian stars in this action comedy about the switched identities of an unsuccessful actor & a professional assassin.

programme.title: Colour of the Game

programme.title: All My Life
programme.desc: Inspired by a true story, 'All My Life' follows a young couple (Jessica Rothe and Harry Shum Jr.) who are planning their wedding even after the groom's devastating cancer diagnosis.

programme.title: Hollywood on Set S1 Ep934
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes of three major motion pictures per week; catch action footage and interviews with actors and filmmakers.

programme.title: Body Cam
programme.desc: A veteran investigating the bizarre murder of a fellow officer discovers a mysterious figure in the body cam footage. She suspects something supernatural is targeting the cops in her unit.

programme.title: Rogue
programme.desc: As team leader, O'Hara leads a squad of soldiers to rescue hostages in remote Africa. The mission goes awry when they face a brutal encounter with a gang of rebels and a horde of enraged lions.

programme.title: The Spongebob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
programme.desc: SpongeBob travels to our world to locate a burger recipe stolen by a pirate.

programme.title: E.T.

programme.title: Hugo

programme.title: Spontaneous
programme.desc: When students inexplicably start to explode, Mara and her friends stay close together as they await possible combustion - wondering what part of life is worth living if it might end suddenly.

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: With the law enforcement closing in, a math savant who works with criminal organisations takes on a legitimate client only to find a discrepancy in their books.

programme.title: Kingdom of the Crystal Skull

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog

programme.title: Come Away
programme.desc: Highly creative origin story of Peter Pan and Alice In Wonderland as siblings who, trying to save their parents from despair, choose between home and imagination.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: An international naval coalition becomes the world's last hope for survival as they engage a hostile alien force in this epic action-adventure.

programme.title: The Conjuring
programme.desc: Two paranormal investigators are called upon to help a family terrorised by a dark presence in a farmhouse.

programme.title: Fatal Intuition
programme.desc: A man tries to find the killer of his sister and seeks revenge by enlisting the help of a medium.

programme.title: Rv: Resurrected Victims
programme.desc: Surreal cases are reported globally where victims come back to life to avenge the murderer. One day, prosecutor Jin-hong's dead mother returns home and tries to kill him...

programme.title: Parallel Life
programme.desc: After his wife is brutally murdered, a judge discovers that his life bears an eerie resemblance to that of a long-ago predecessor.

programme.title: My Girlfriend Is an Agent
programme.desc: A secret agent couple goes behind each other's backs, unknowingly on the same mission to stop a Russian organized crime ring from stealing an advanced bio-chemical weapon.

programme.title: Queen of Walking
programme.desc: A high school girl who has to walk for four hours to school everyday unexpectedly discovers her talent for walking and begins training as a speed walking athlete.

programme.title: Underground Rendezvous
programme.desc: A series of disasters in the big city bring an aspiring teacher to a small town where he falls in love with a girl whose origins are mysterious.

programme.title: Lover'S Concerto
programme.desc: Anonymous love letters keep coming to Ji-hwan, refreshing his memories 5 years ago of two long-lost best friends, but when love rushed in, who will be left behind?

programme.title: Broken
programme.desc: Two teenage boys raped and murdered Sang-hyun's daughter. The infuriated father unintensionally killed one of the murderer and became a fugitive himself...

programme.title: Yoga
programme.desc: Hyo-jung is insecure about her appearance. She joined the yoga academy wishing to restore beauty, yet strange things begin to unfold...

programme.title: Master
programme.desc: An intellectual crime investigation team goes after One Network, a company involved in a massive fraud and corruption case in Korea.

programme.title: Deliver Us From Evil
programme.desc: A retired contract killer investigates a kidnapping case which may involve his next of kin, all the while relentlessly chased by his last target's blood brother.

programme.title: Guimoon: the Lightless Door
programme.desc: As exorcist Do-jin heads over to an abandoned community center with rumors of strange deaths, he met 3 college students there to capture the rumored events and realised they're trapped...

programme.title: A Girl at My Door
programme.desc: A policewoman encounters a young girl in need of help but things become more mysterious as she gets to know her.

programme.title: The King'S Case Note
programme.desc: A clever King and his brilliant chronicle keeper hunt for the truth behind a crime that threatens the throne and the stability of the country.

programme.title: Confession of Murder
programme.desc: A police officer haunted for failing to capture a serial killer 15 years back, returns to the case after a novelist publishes the book 'I am the Murderer', claiming responsibility for the crimes.

programme.title: Love Guide for Dumpees
programme.desc: Two recently dumped singles spend a wild drunken night together to get over their exes, then agree to meet nine more times before promising never to see other again.

programme.title: Boys Be!
programme.desc: When two high school friends the best fighter in school and the other who hates physical conflict get involved in a fight involving local mobsters, they discover the true meaning of friendship.

programme.title: Part-Time Spy
programme.desc: A former contract worker at the National Security Agency works with an undercover detective to recover money that was stolen from her boss in a voice phishing scheme.

programme.title: Mr. Zoo: the Missing Vip
programme.desc: After discovering he can suddenly talk to animals, an intelligence agent partners with a canine pal to take care of a case gone sideways.

programme.title: Door Lock
